title: Morning Management
story: Rajika and Harsha, 11 and 12 years old, wake up early to schedule the grocery delivery for that week. In a given week they have a long list of special items, as well as a regularly scheduled list of items to deliver as well. Several vendors must be consulted and negotiated with in order to get everything on the list. Once they've found everything, they schedule a courier delivery for noon that day.
